item.title: What is Machine Anthropology?
item.description: For those unfamiliar with the field, cultural anthropology is the study of human cultures, practices and habits in a holistic and comparative manner. Its core method is ethnographic fieldwork, which means researchers spend a long time in the field with their subjects, live with them, talk with them, socialize with them, and observe relationships and behaviours. But recently, anthropology has begun to use also machine learning and data mining as a part of its method.

item.title: Aggregate, Group By and Pivot with... Pivot Table!
item.description: Orange recently welcomed its new Pivot Table widget, which offers functionalities for data aggregation, grouping and, well, pivot tables. The widget is a one-stop-shop for pandas’ aggregate, groupby and pivot_table functions. Let us see how to achieve these tasks in Orange.
